campaigns.title: Powered Kits Learning Boxes
campaigns.short_description: he DITA short description is one device to achieve "progressive disclosure" in topic-based writing, in the sense that title expands to short description, which expands to the topic itself as a user drills into information. Consistent use of short description helps to provide this progressive user experience. The "short description" approach in writing topics could be compared with the "topic sentence" approach in writing paragraphs that is regularly taught in classes from elementary school through college.
campaigns.content:
he DITA short description is one device to achieve "progressive disclosure" in topic-based writing, in the sense that title expands to short description, which expands to the topic itself as a user drills into information. Consistent use of short description helps to provide this progressive user experience. The "short description" approach in writing topics could be compared with the "topic sentence" approach in writing paragraphs that is regularly taught in classes from elementary school through college.
